abstract: Supreme Court decision allows public release of 27 memos written by Prince Charles to government ministers that contain strong personal views.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court on Thursday paved the way for the public release of 27 memos written by Prince Charles to government ministers.

headline.main: Britain: The Prince and the Papers
headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: The Prince and the Papers

snippet: The Supreme Court on Thursday paved the way for the public release of 27 memos written by Prince Charles to government ministers.
